meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
readingMnemonic: When you finally have a <vocabulary>grave</vocabulary> and you're dead and buried, your one wish is for the New Zealand All Blacks to do the <reading>Haka</reading> (はか) over your grave. If you don't know what the haka is, look it up, it's pretty neat.
